mapper.insert: insert into commodity (name, introduce, price, time, typeid, userid, state,image) value (#{name},#{introduce},#{price},#{time},#{commodityType.id},#{userId},#{state},#{image});
mapper.update: update commodity set name=#{name} where id=#{id};
update commodity set introduce=#{introduce} where id=#{id};
update commodity set price=#{price} where id=#{id};
update commodity set state=#{state} where id=#{id};
update commodity set typeid=#{type} where id=#{id};
update commodity set image=#{image} where id=#{id};
mapper.select: select * from commodity where id=#{id} and state=1;
select * from commodity where state=1 and name like "%"#{name}"%";
